transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Sir, ye Multi Soft System and sir, sir, se baat ho rahi hai?
Customer: Bolo.
Executive: Good evening sir, Pratik baat kar raha tha IndiaMART se senior manager, kaise hain aap?
Customer: Bolo sir, badhiya.
Executive: Sir, wo aapne feedback diya tha sir, kal Abhinav se aapki baat hui thi meri team mein wo work karte hain aur aapka account manage karte hain.
Customer: To usi ke regarding maine connect kara tha sir ki koi issue aa raha tha kya jisme aapne feedback pe not satisfied mark kiya tha sir.
Customer: Unhone call kiya mujhe, sir bole aapka subscription khatam ho raha hai to renew kar lo.
Executive: Subscription khatam ho raha hai sir, abhi to aapka January tak services hai sir. 17 January.
Customer: Ha, to unko maine, to unko maine simple pucha ki sir mera subscription kab khatam ho raha hai? Bole next week mein aapka khatam ho jayega.
Customer: Achha, theek hai sir.
Executive: Next week mein unhone bola aapse?
Customer: Ha, to next week mein agar khatam ho jata hai sir mera subscription to mujhe lead milegi? To wo bole nahi sir bole aapko relevant lead jo hai wo nahi milegi bole.
Customer: Baad mein, sirf aapka package dikhega bole lekin lead nahi milegi.
Customer: To maine unko pucha ki theek hai sir, aap mujhe ek kaam karo, maine aapko payment kab diya tha aur renewal kab kiya tha iska zara detail de sakte ho?
Executive: Ji.
Customer: To wo mujhe bole ki mujhe wo access nahi hai bole.
Executive: Ji.
Customer: Ki aapka date kaisa hai, kya hai ye sab main nahi bata sakta. To fir maine unko pucha ki aap call kaise kar rahe ho fir customer ko ki subscription khatam hone wala hai ye wo.
Customer: Wo bole ki aapka subscription khatam ho jayega isliye maine call kiya hai bole. Theek hai fir unko maine bataya ki sir aap jo baat kar rahe ho ye galat hai. Maine aapko payment kiya hai January mein.
Customer: To mera package ka subscription jo hai wo January tak hai. Agar aapke paas pura data nahi to aap call kyun kar rahe hai, mislead kyun kar rahe customer ko?
Executive: Ji Abhinav ne bola hai aapko sir ki aapka services khatam ho jayega?
Customer: Recording bhej sakta hu sir main aapko.
Executive: Recording hai aapke paas?
Customer: Ha, to unko maine bola ki main aapki complaint kar sakta hu lekin wo baad mein bole nahi sir sorry ye hua wo. To ye galat baat hai sir aap customer ko aise mislead nahi kar sakte.
Executive: Bilkul galat baat hai sir, bilkul galat aapne matlab achha hua sir ki aapne matlab not satisfied mark kiya jisse mere usme ye baat aayi sir ki kam se kam at least mujhe pata chala. Kyunki sir aise hi agar karte to sir matlab ab to koi bhi client ho sir usko pata hi nahi hota hai.
Customer: To maine unko thoda sa data aur bola ki sir main aapka panch chhe saal se customer hu, okay? Hamara kuch jyada calling ya kuch aisa kaam bhi nahi rehta hai, hamara kaam chal raha hai aapka kaam chal raha hai lekin ye aap jo kar rahe ho ye galat hai.
Executive: Bilkul sir galat hai.
Customer: To unko bola maine aapke liye offer tha ye tha matlab ye baatein mat banao abhi, offer ka baat alag hai aur subscription khatam hone wala hai renew kar lo ye baat alag hai.
Executive: Exactly, exactly.
Customer: To sir maine unko ye bhi bataya ki aapne 10 January ko payment kiya tha na dekh raha tha sir 10 January 2024 ko credit card ke through aapne payment kiya tha.
Customer: Pata hai sir mujhe mera, mera dekho IndiaMART, Justdial sabka subscription jo hai wo directly January mein hi rehta hai.
Executive: Achha January to January payment karte hain aap?
Customer: Nahi bole hamare, hamare team ne bola hai bole humko calling karne ke liye isliye call kar rahe hai. Matlab calling karne ke liye bola hoga lekin subscription khatam ho gaya aur kar lo aisa thodi bola hoga.
Executive: Nahi nahi main abhi matlab inke khilaf ek strict action le raha hu aur inko warning issue kar raha hu. Aur even main aapko bhi loop mein le lunga aapki mail id yaha pe jo registered hai sir wo kya mail id aapki active hai work kar rahi hai?
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Ji hai?
Executive: Main ek kaam kar raha hu inko ek warning letter issue kar raha hu IndiaMART ki taraf se. Aur sir I am really sorry.
Customer: Galat baat hai na aise samjho kisi customer ne owner ne agar nahi dekha aur wo bola chalo sir ha kar lete hai ye kar lete hai wo kar lete hai to ye galat baat hoti hai na fir.
Executive: Nahi nahi bilkul sir ye to matlab ek tarike se afwahe failane ki baat hui sir ki bata de bata de aapko to pata hi hota hai sir ki aapne kab renewal karaya kab nahi karaya ye to unhone galat hi baat kari ab offer wagera hote hain sir to usme kya hota hai ki jaise inform kiya jata hai ki pehle se ki agar aap pehle payment karte ho iska to ye offer hai matlab abhi current mein jo hum logon ka chal raha tha maine matlab team mein drive kiya tha ki jo hai kuch discounts wagera available hai to koi client agar pehle payment karna chahta hai to aap unko offer kar sakte hain hamara ye price current mein chal raha hai aur kuch additional benefits hai. To maine wahi inform kiya tha but aise kehna to sir bilkul hi galat hai sir.
Customer: Main ek kaam kar raha hu main unki taraf se sir aapse sorry keh raha hu.
Executive: Aap calling ke liye, aap calling ke liye kya kar sakte ho? Sir main IndiaMART se baat kar raha hu aapka subscription January mein khatam hone wala hai lekin aapke liye offer hai. To aap ye kar sakte ho kya ye puchna chahiye na?
Executive: Yahi yahi cheezein to maine unko char bar pucha hai ki sir aapke paas data hai kya aapne calling kiya hai mera subscription kab khatam hone wala hai? Bole next week mein khatam hone wala hai maine theek hai sir aapke paas data hai kisne diya hai mujhe zara bata do.
Customer: Ji.
Customer: Nahi bole mere paas data nahi hai matlab data nahi hai to fir aap calling kyun kar rahe ho customer ko?
Executive: Baat sahi hai sir aapki matlab ye to bilkul hi matlab mere pehla aisa case hua hai sir jo sunne mein aa raha hai ki aisa hai mujhe lag raha hai ki.
Customer: Aap ek kaam karo na unse, unse pucho na kya hua tha aisa wo batayenge aapko.
Executive: Nahi nahi sir main kal meeting rakh raha hu inke sath aur abhi unko ek mail warning mail issue kar raha hu sir. Kyunki hamari jo bhi recording calling hoti hai wo recorded line pe hoti hai hamare side bhi wo recording hogi sir jo aap. Dekho sir aapka itna bada system hai aapke paas to recording bhi hota hai call.
Executive: Bilkul hota hai har ek call ka recording hota hai sir.
Customer: Ha lekin, lekin maine mere separate side mein maine bhi call record karke rakh diya hai.
Executive: Nahi nahi sahi keh rahe hain aap ye sir. To abhi aap matlab kya chahte hain kya kiya jaye sir?
Customer: Nahi jaane do abhi kya karne ka fir. Warning to sir issue karni padegi sir warna fir dekhiye aise hi cheeze agar hongi to sir IndiaMART ka naam kharab ho raha hai sir agar aisa hua to.
Customer: Nahi warning kar do.
Customer: Warning kar do wo ghabra gaye the thoda jyada bole the.
Executive: Nahi nahi ghabrane ki baat nahi hai sir matlab ye galat baat hai bilkul sir kisi ke sath bhi agar aisa ghatna hai to galat baat hai. Baki unko maine yahi bola tha jaise hamari starting mein kya hua tha ki jaise abhi current mein offer chal rahe hain sir jaise abhi aapne dekha hoga ki aapne jo amount pay kiya tha to 28000 plus GST ki hamari jo MDC ki costing chal rahi hai wo hamari 30 tarikh tak valid hai jaise koi client agar January ya February mein renewal hai to agar wo process karna chahta hai abhi to usko hum cost benefit thoda provide kar rahe hain kyunki sare prices next month se increase hone wale hain to humne bas convey karne ke liye kaha tha ki client ko convey kar dijiye at least ki next month se December se sare prices increase ho rahe hain 32000 plus GST ki costing ho rahi hai lekin abhi agar koi renewal process karta hai to usko wahi 28000 plus GST ki costing pe hum submit karwa rahe hain renewal lekin is tarike se sir batana hai to sir ye to tarika nahi hai sir batane ka ye bilkul hi galat hai.
Customer: Abhi aapne kya bataya ki sir dekho aisa aisa costing hai badhne wala hai agar aap kar sakte hai to karo ye simple baat hua na.
Customer: Ha aur kya sir aisa.
Customer: To abhi main kar raha hu inko warning.
Customer: Ye dekho na aap kya karo mujhe aapka jo costing badhne wala hai iska detail hai to mujhe whatsapp kar do mere number pe.
Executive: Theek hai sir.
Customer: To main dekhta hu chalega sir?
Executive: Bilkul main proposal create karke aapko ek share kar raha hu aapke whatsapp pe bhi aur aapke mail pe bhi aap jo hai ek bar proposal dekh lijiye kyunki cost wise thoda sa achha benefit mil ja raha hai to agar karenge to kuch additional benefit bhi mil jayega to services aapki wahi se start hongi jaise January mein aapki khatam hai to January se hum start karwayenge lekin wahi hai ki paisa aap pehle pay kar rahe ho kyunki aapko cost wise benefit mil raha hai to agar aapko sahi lage ki cheeze to aap process kar dijiyega.
Customer: Barabar sir.
Executive: Bilkul bilkul sir aur baki main iska ek bar kal Abhinav se meeting karke aur warning issue kar raha hu unko kal bolta hu aapko call karke sorry bhi bolenge sir wo bhi aapko.
Customer: Aap kya hai aapke paas ek chota sa, bilkul hamara jo discussion hua hai iske liye ek chota sa sir feedback jayega mail pe aapke to agar sari cheeze sahi hai to satisfied mark kar dijiyega sir.
Customer: Yes yes okay.
Executive: Okay sir. Thank you so much for your time sir.
Customer: Ji.
summary:
Concerns:

- Misleading call about subscription expiry.

- Executive's team member provided incorrect information.



Resolution:

- Executive apologized for the misleading call.

- Assured strict action and warning to the team member.

- Offered to keep the customer in the loop.

- Promised a call and apology from the team member.

- Agreed to share details of the costing increase.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will share a proposal on WhatsApp/email.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- subscription, misleading call, apology, renewal, offer
